headline: THK PRECISION LINEAR MOTION GUIDE ACTUATOR, 9" TRAVEL
description: Precision Linear Motion Guide Actuator    THK KR-33A  The KR Actuator is composed of a one-piece outer rail surrounding an inner block. With a ball screw drive through the block’s center, and two linear motion guide raceways per each side of the block, the space-saving design provides extremely rigid and highly accurate actuator function and utilities.
specstable:
Manufacturer THK
Model KR33A
Configuration Single Axis
Total Travel, XYZ X: 9.00 in (229 mm)
Mechanical Drive System Precision Ball screw
Stage Bearing Type Ball Bearing
Screw Pitch 2 turns per inch
Linear Accuracy 0.1 mm
Stage Length 15.00 in (381 mm)
Stage Width 2.30 in (58 mm)
Table Length 2.88 in (73.15 mm)
Table Width 2.00 in (50.80 mm)
Tabletop Height 2.30 in (58.42 mm)
Maximum Travel Speed 25.000 in/s (635 mm/s)
Motor Drive: Stepper Motor Size: NEMA 23
Cables Included Yes
Other Information
  • Static Permissable Moment (Kgf-m): Ma = 16.9, Mb = 16.9, Mc = 43.7
  • Positioning Repeatability: 0.01 mm
  • Backlash: 0.20 mm
  • Rated Stroke: 300
